titleStmt.title: Memorable conceits of diuers noble and famous personages of Christendome, of this our moderne time
Divers propos memorables des nobles & illustres hommes de la chrestienté. English
titleStmt.author: Corrozet, Gilles, 1510-1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Iames Shaw,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Corrozet, Gilles. Divers propos memorables des nobles & illustres hommes de la chrestienté.
The last two leaves are blank except for ruled borders.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
